Message:
Any witches found
in human territory are
to be executed on sight.

That’s just how things
work in this town—
no, this world.

Mom and Dad always tried
to hide the truth about me...

But, one day,
the townspeople found out.
They killed my
parents mercilessly,

saying, “Anyone hiding a witch
will be tried as one.”

They were going to
kill me next.
But, just as I was
about to be executed...

That’s what Miss Lucille said
as she rescued me from
the town’s Witch Hunt.

As I gazed up at my hero,
I thought...

For the rest of my life,
I’ll follow this person...
My leader...!
